instruction: Add 3 details to the text to make it more interesting.
input: The cat sat on the windowsill.
output: The cat sat on the windowsill, purring contently as it watched its humans go about their business. Its tail flicked back and forth as the wind ruffled its fur and the sun shone in through the window. Its whiskers twitched as it heard distant birds chirping and its eyes sparkled with curiosity as it looked out at the bustling city.
